INSERT INTO dev_menu ( menu_id, menu_name, menu_jb, menu_sjbh, menu_path, menu_url, menu_order, menu_switch, menu_info, menu_type, menu_kind, menu_module, menu_Table_Name, iconNo
) VALUES ( #menuId#, #menuName#, #menuJb#, #menuSjbh#, #menuPath#, #menuUrl#, #menuOrder#, #menuSwitch#, #menuInfo#, #menuType#, #menuKind#, #menuModule#,#menuTableName#,#iconNo# )
sqlMap.select: select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind ,menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName ,iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu where menu_id=#menuId#

select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind ,menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName ,iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu menu_kind = #kind#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE dev_menu SET menu_name = #menuName#, menu_url = #menuUrl#,menu_type = #menuType#, menu_switch = #menuSwitch#, iconNo= #iconNo#, menu_info = #menuInfo#,menu_kind = #menuKind# , menu_module = #menuModule# ,menu_Table_Name = #menuTableName# WHERE menu_id = #menuId#
sqlMap.select: select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind , menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName, iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu where menu_kind = 12 or menu_kind = 1 order by menu_order

select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind , menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName,iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu where (menu_kind = 12 or menu_kind = 1) and menu_sjbh=#menuSjbh# order by menu_order

select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind , menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName,iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu where menu_kind like '%2%' order by menu_order

select menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_jb as menuJb, menu_sjbh as menuSjbh, menu_path as menuPath, menu_url as menuUrl, menu_order as menuOrder, menu_switch menuSwitch, menu_info as menuInfo, menu_type as menuType , menu_kind as menuKind , menu_module as menuModule ,menu_Table_Name as menuTableName,iconNo as iconNo from dev_menu where 1=1
order by menu_order
SELECT max(MENU_ID) FROM dev_menu WHERE MENU_SWITCH='1'
select o.id,o.menu_id as menuId, o.opt_code as optCode, o.opt_name as optName from dev_menu_opt o where o.menu_id=#id# order by opt_order asc
select max(menu_order) from dev_menu where menu_sjbh = #sjbh#
